page.title: 15Religion (continued)
page.content: Our minister's week can consist of visiting _ the housebound and the hospitalised,(and during the course of the year he tries to visit every home in the parish), administration (two mornings a week), convening on a panel of worship of the General Assembly Committee ( once a month), attending H.M.S.Claverhouse as a Royal Navy chaplain (25 nights+14 days in any year), preparing for worship (Saturday) and taking funeral and wedding services.(There have been only 3 funerals in the last year.) Our minister hopes to start a teenage group.
